code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';var GravatarIMGController=function GravatarIMGController(props){var profilePicGravatar=props.profilePicGravatar;if(profilePicGravatar.url!==''){return React.createElement("img",{className:"player-profile-img-header","data-testid":"header-profile-picture",src:profilePicGravatar.url,alt:"profile"});}return React.createElement("img",{className:"player-profile-img-header","data-testid":"header-profile-picture",src:"http://www.gravatar.com/avatar",alt:"Default Profile"});};var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{profilePicGravatar:state.gravatarReducer.picture};};export default connect(mapStateToProps)(GravatarIMGController);GravatarIMGController.defaultProps={profilePicGravatar:{}};
